solution_line_template: The pet store has {dogs_for_sale}/{cats_divisor} = <<{dogs_for_sale}/{cats_divisor}={cats_for_sale}>>{cats_for_sale} cats for sale.
They have {dogs_for_sale} x {birds_multiplier} = <<{dogs_for_sale}*{birds_multiplier}={birds_for_sale}>>{birds_for_sale} birds for sale.
They have {dogs_for_sale} x {fish_multiplier} = <<{dogs_for_sale}*{fish_multiplier}={fish_for_sale}>>{fish_for_sale} birds for sale.

Therefore, there are a total of {dogs_for_sale} + {cats_for_sale} + {birds_for_sale} + {fish_for_sale} = <<{dogs_for_sale}+{cats_for_sale}+{birds_for_sale}+{fish_for_sale}={total_animals}>>{total_animals} pets for sale.
